resources.string: smarter,\nmore efficient apps\nfor the intelligent user
The Sky Color for Better Clock

The object of Better Game is to obtain "Points".

 One "Point" shall be gained for each press of "Better Gameplay," and one "Point" shall be docked for every press of "Better Obstacle."

 When ten "Points" have been earned, one "Better Point" shall be gained.

 If the current "Point" total is zero, "Better Obstacle" shall deduct one "Better Point" instead.

 Once ten "Better Points" have been earned, "Better Goal" shall be unlocked, and for each press of "Better Goal," one "Win" shall be awarded.

 After ten "Wins," have been awarded, a "Better Win" shall be awarded, and it is at this point the player should consider themselves victorious.

 If, at any point in the game the total "Points" value drops below negative five, the game is lost.

 Have fun and try your best!
























 Disclaimer: There is no guarantee that "Better Game: Play Perfected" will provide any type of "Fun" to the user, nor is there any guarantee that "Better Game: Play Perfected" will provide any type of "Challenge." The user shall assume any and all risks of mental or bodily harm due to accidental fun.
Welcome to Better Game: Play Perfected.

The Better Oracle welcomes thee…
 To try and find your destiny…
 Reveal your fortune, fill the gaps…
 On the crystal ball, provide three taps…

To tell your fortune I must know,
 A few details ye have to show… 
I'll start off easy, give it a whirl, 
Be thou boy or be thou girl?

Answer my questions, don't be late…
 This next one will decide your fate…
 Since humans tend to walk and roam,
 Of these great nations, which is home?

My third request you shall not shun,
 We must return to chapter one…
 As life's a book read page by page
 Divulge your birthday, reveal your age…

My fourth request goes back in time…
 To when the world was in it's prime…
 All ancient folk revered divinity…
 To which god do you give affinity?

My fifth question is by far the best…
 Answer this at my behest…
 Provide the answer to this query:

string-array.name: sillyQs
string-array.item: Are you wearing blue jeans right now?
Do you like the Canadian band Rush?
Do you have ten or more fingers?
Have you ingested a vegetable\n in the last 45 hours?
Did you lie about any of your previous answers?
Was the Battle of the Bulge the most\n influential battle of \nthe revolutionary war?

resources.string: Type a message to Better Chatbot!
